title: Live Transcribe now lets you transcribe speech while offline
content:
Google announced a boatload of new Android features yesterday. Gboard is getting new Emoji Kitchen stickers and a grammar correction tool; Messages is receiving Nudges and automatic SMS sorting features while Google Photos is getting a neat Portrait Mode. Alongside Google’s flagship apps and services, the Live Trascribe app is also getting better. In its

The post Live Transcribe now lets you transcribe speech while offline appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Live Transcribe app now has an offline mode and can continue to provide real-time text-to-speech transcriptions when you're offline.
